property.name: local_pch_file
property.help: The filename of a local precompiled header file. The file will be included in quotes.

property.name: src_preamble
property.help: Code to generate at the top of the source file after the inclusion of any local precompiled header file. This can include er files, comments, macros, etc.

property.name: original_art
property.help: The directory containing your original artwork.

property.name: converted_art
property.help: The directory containing XPM and PNG header files.

property.name: internationalize
property.help: Wrap strings in a _() macro which expands into a call to wxGetTranslation().

property.name: help_provider
property.help: The class of help provider to use for context-sensitive help.

property.name: namespace
property.help: Namespace to enclose class declarations in. Separate nested namespaces with a double colon (e.g. company::app::subname)

property.name: class_name
property.help: The name of the base class.

property.name: title
property.help: The text to display on the dialog's title bar.

property.name: persist
property.help: Use wxPersistentRegisterAndRestore to save/restore the size and position of the dialog.

option.name: wxDIALOG_EX_CONTEXTHELP
option.help: Under Windows, puts a query button on the caption. When pressed, Windows will go into a context-sensitive help mode and wxWidgets will send a wxEVT_HELP event if the user clicked on an application window. Note: The Project's "help_provider" property must be set for context-sensitive help to work.

option.name: wxDIALOG_EX_METAL
option.help: On Mac OS X, frames with this style will be shown with a metallic look.

property.name: center
property.help: Centers the dialog box on the display in the chosen direction.

property.name: icon
property.help: Specifies the image to display in the title bar of the dialog.

event.name: wxEVT_INIT_DIALOG
event.help: Generated when the dialog is being initialized.

property.name: class_name
property.help: The name of the base class.

event.name: wxEVT_INIT_DIALOG
event.help: generated when the panel is being initialised.

property.name: class_name
property.help: The name of the base class.

property.name: title
property.help: The text to display on the frame's title bar.

option.name: wxFRAME_EX_CONTEXTHELP
option.help: Under Windows, puts a query button on the caption. When pressed, Windows will go into a context-sensitive help mode and wxWidgets will send a wxEVT_HELP event if the user clicked on an application window. You cannot use this style together with wxMAXIMIZE_BOX or wxMINIMIZE_BOX, so you should use wxDEFAULT_FRAME_STYLE & ~ (wxMINIMIZE_BOX | wxMAXIMIZE_BOX) for the frames having this style (the dialogs don't have a minimize or a maximize box by default). Note: The Project's "help_provider" property must be set for context-sensitive help to work.

option.name: wxFRAME_EX_METAL
option.help: On Mac OS X, frames with this style will be shown with a metallic look. This is an extra style.

property.name: center
property.help: Centers the dialog box on the display in the chosen direction.

property.name: class_name
property.help: The name of the base class.

option.name: wxMB_DOCKABLE
option.help: Allows the menu bar to be detached (wxGTK only).

property.name: class_name
property.help: The name of the base class.

property.name: bitmapsize
property.help: Default size of each tool bitmap. The default bitmap size is 16 by 15 pixels.

property.name: margins
property.help: Values to be used as margins for the toolbar.

property.name: packing
property.help: Value used for spacing tools. Remarks: The packing is used for spacing in the vertical direction if the toolbar is horizontal, and for spacing in the horizontal direction if the toolbar is vertical.

property.name: separation
property.help: The default separator size. Remarks: This is the size between each toolbar tool.

property.name: class_name
property.help: The name of the base class.

property.name: title
property.help: The text to display on the Wizard's title bar.

property.name: bitmap
property.help: Bitmap to display on the left side of the wizard (default: none).

option.name: wxWIZARD_EX_HELPBUTTON
option.help: Shows a Help button using wxID_HELP.

property.name: center
property.help: Centers the dialog box on the display in the chosen direction.

event.name: wxEVT_INIT_DIALOG
event.help: Generated when the Wizard is being initialized.

event.name: wxEVT_WIZARD_BEFORE_PAGE_CHANGED
event.help: Generated after Next is clicked but before GetNext is called. Unlike wxEVT_WIZARD_PAGE_CHANGING, the handler for this function can change state that might affect the return value of GetNext. This event can be vetoed.

event.name: wxEVT_WIZARD_PAGE_SHOWN
event.help: The page was shown and laid out (this event cannot be vetoed).

event.name: wxEVT_WIZARD_CANCEL
event.help: The user attempted to cancel the wizard (this event may be vetoed).

event.name: wxEVT_WIZARD_HELP
event.help: Generated when the help button is pressed.

event.name: wxEVT_WIZARD_FINISHED
event.help: Generated when the finish button is pressed.

property.name: bitmap
property.help: Page-specific bitmap (default: none).

property.name: class_name
property.help: The name of the base class.

property.name: border
property.help: Specifies the type of border to use for the window.
